full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN GDUGS DKAR GYI BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(BZLOG BSGYUR 'DI NI RLUNG RTA GUNG PA DANG, NAD RIMS 'BAR BA DANG, KHA SMRAS THUG PA DANG, GROD PA'I BYOL PO DANG, 'DRE SDANG BA DANG, CHAGS CHE DANG, LO ZLA ZHAG SKEG DANG, MI PHYUGS KYI GOD KHA RNAMS LA NYAMS SU BLANG NA PHAN YON SHIN TU CHE'O, ,SMRAS PA, MI BZAD SNYIGS MA'I LNGA BDOS DUS MTHA' 'DIR, ,RKYEN DANG SDUG BSNGAL CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I TSE, ,BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GA RDO RJE'I MTSON CHA NYID, ,MTHONG THOS DRI MAS MA GOS LAG LEN 'DI, ,GZHAN DO BSRUNG PHYIR BLO ZHI MING CAN GYIS, ,'BAD PA DU MA'I GSUNG GDIN LHAN THABS LA, ,LEGS PAR BSGRIGS TE YI GE GZUGS SU BKOD, ,'GRO KUN MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RAB RGYAS SHOG ,CES 'PHAGS MA GTZUG TOR DKAR MO'I @009B BZLOG BSGYUR MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BLA MA DANG BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG NOM CHI NANG SOO NGAG DBANG SBYIN PAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU NGUR SMRIG 'DZIN PA'I ZLOS GAR BSGYUR BA RJE BTZUN RDO RJE 'CHANG, DZA YA PAndI TA ZHES MTSAN YONGS SU GRAGS PA DE NYID KYI ZHABS KYI RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA BKA' DRIN GYIS CUNG ZAD MYONG PAS BYANG PHYOGS SOG PA'I YUL 'DIR BYAMS PA'I PHYOGS MED BLO ZHI MING CAN GYIS, ,SNGON GYI MKHAS PA'I GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PAS 'DIS KYANG BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS MA MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
